CustomField.description: Added for PS-POS MDM dashboard. If 1, Start Production is between today and next 364 days. If 2, it is between 365-730 from today.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Added for PS-POS MDM dashboard. If 1, Start Production is between today and next 364 days. If 2, it is between 365-730 from today.
CustomField.label: Start Prod In Year
